item.title: thought of the day
item.description: everything in the universe either is or isn’t a potato.

item.title: thought of the day
item.description: wherever you go, there you are

item.title: thought of the day
item.description: why do they tell us to use the stairs in case of fire? shouldn’t we be using a fire extinguisher?

item.title: Joe on Sporty-ball-z
item.description: For every nerd calling something sportsball there needs to be a jock that walks into a library and yells “WHAT’S UP WITH ALL THESE WORD BURGERS”

item.title: Thought of the day
item.description: things are not what they appear to be. nor are they otherwise.
